title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - RFC for Code-Architect Review
description: Clearly outline the project's objectives, user stories, functional requirements, and non-functional requirements for BCI-powered art generation. This includes consideration of system architecture, data processing, real-time interaction, and artistic style customization.

title: Design BCI System Architecture
description: Create a high-level design for the system, including hardware and software components, data flow, communication protocols, and integration with the art generation module.

title: Implement Brain Activity Data Acquisition Module
description: Develop a module to capture brain activity data using BCI hardware and prepare it for further processing.

title: Design and Develop Art Generation Algorithm
description: Create an algorithm to interpret brain activity data and generate corresponding visual or auditory art.
dependencies: Implement Brain Activity Data Acquisition Module

title: Create User Interface for Art Preview and Controls
description: Develop a user-friendly interface to allow users to interact with the generated art, providing options to customize and control the output.

title: Test Art Generation Algorithm and User Interface
description: Perform thorough testing of the art generation algorithm and user interface to ensure proper functionality, responsiveness, and usability.
dependencies: Design and Develop Art Generation Algorithm
Create User Interface for Art Preview and Controls

title: Document System Design and Implementation Details
description: Write clear, concise documentation detailing the project's design, architecture, implementation, and usage instructions.
dependencies: Implement Brain Activity Data Acquisition Module
Design and Develop Art Generation Algorithm
Create User Interface for Art Preview and Controls
